Version History

Changelog - Bookmark Creator

[1.0.0] - 2025-12-18

  • Initial Release: Create and export browser bookmarks for ZTools.
  • Features: Group by category, search filter, and bulk selection.
  • Export: Standard Netscape HTML format compatible with all major browsers.
  • UX: Added step-by-step visual guide for importing bookmarks.
